attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe after working all your life and and paying off a mortgage which diminishes towards retirement, I feel council tax is an unfair payment for pensioners as its an opposite burden to the mortgage they have just paid off. One financial burden goes down the other goes up. Very very unfair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
